snippet: Mamagyro, run by a mother-daughter team, draws local medical professionals on the Upper East Side with its Greek comfort food as well as its healthier options.
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Mamagyro, homey Greek-run restaurant on Upper East Side that draws doctors and staff from nearby Lenox Hill Hospital.
lead_paragraph: Mamagyro, run by a mother-daughter team, draws local medical professionals on the Upper East Side with its Greek comfort food as well as its healthier options.

headline.main: At Mamagyro, a Greek Mother Is Behind the Counter, and on Top of Trends
